processed_by.processor: Cui, Hong using Text2XML java application init commit r86, validated against beeSchema.xsd revision f0a80a8516a06e51224d01314403eb26d60f881d

taxon_identification.taxon_hierarchy: family rosaceae;tribe rubeae;genus rubus;subgenus eubatus;section triviales;species caesius;

treatment.description: Low-arching or trailing, with glaucous or pruinose terete canes bearing weak prickles; primocane-leaves 3-foliolate, the thin slightly pubescent leaflets broad- or rhombic-ovate; inflorescence a corymb; pedicels glandular and sparingly bristly; calyx-lobes abruptly long-acuminate, reflexed in anthesis but appressed to the fruit; petals suborbicular or broad-ovate, white; fruit black, with a bloom.
treatment.habitat_elevation_distribution_or_ecolog: Spreading from cult., local. (Introd. from Eu.)
